titles.title: A bill to deem the submission of certain claims to an Indian Health Service contracting officer as timely.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Akaka without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 509.

action.text: By Senator Akaka from Committee on Indian Affairs filed written report. Report No. 112-228.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 9/13/2012--Reported to Senate without amendment. Deems a claim submitted to an Indian Health Service contracting officer pursuant to the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act on or before October 31, 2005, involving a claim that accrued after October 1, 1995, and on or before September 30, 1999, to have been timely submitted.
